Indices for database table ["$NODE->{title}"]

[% my $table = $NODE->{title}; my @cols = qw( Name Dup Seq Column Coll Card SubPt Packed Comment ); my %cols = ( Name=>'Key_name', Seq=>'Seq_in_index', Dup=>'Non_unique', Column=>'Column_name', Coll=>'Collation', Card=>'Cardinality', SubPt=>'Sub_part', Packed=>'Packed', Comment=>'Comment' ); my @fields; { my $dbh= $DB->getDatabaseHandle(); my $sth= $dbh->prepare( "show index from $table" ); $sth->execute(); while( my $rec= $sth->fetchrow_hashref() ) { push @fields, $rec; } $sth->finish(); } my $str = ""; $str .= "\n"; $str .= " \n"; foreach my $fieldname ( @cols ) { $str .= qq[ \n]; } $str .= " \n"; foreach my $field ( @fields ) { $str .= " \n"; foreach my $value ( @{$field}{@cols{@cols}} ) { $value = " " if $value eq ""; $str .= " \n"; } $str .= " \n"; } $str .= "
$fieldname
$value
\n"; return $str; %]
